title: Nano 3.0 (compatible Arduino Clone)
description: The Nano 3.0 is a very small compatible arduino microcontroller board. It is complete, and breadboard-friendly board based on the ATmega328 (Nano 3.0) .   Nano board is an Arduino compatible board. It is very suitable for applications where small and compact size is important for user.

title: Uno R3 - Clone
description: The ESP32-CAM is a small size, low power consumption camera module based on ESP32 WIFI development board. It comes with an OV2640 camera and it also features a microSD card slot that can be useful to store images taken with the camera or to store files to serve to clients. The ESP32-CAM suitable for home automation and smart devices, industrial wireless control, wireless video monitoring, QR wireless identification, WiFi image upload, wireless face recognition and other IoT applications. It is an ideal solution for IoT applications.

title: NUCLEO-F103RB (STM32 ARM Cortex Processing Board)
description: The whole series of NUCLEO development boards is equipped with a STM32 microcontroller based on ARM Cortex-M family, adopting a 32-bit RISC architecture. This means extremely high performance microcontroller for serious applications (image processing, real time control, high speed procesing applications).

title: ST-LINK V2 (STM8 / STM32 Programmer)
description: The ST-LINK / V2 is an in-circuit debugger and programmer for the STM8 and STM32 microcontrollers.

title: Joystick Shield for Arduino
description: This joystick shield sits on top of your Arduino and turns it into a simple controller. 7 momentary push buttons (  two-axis analog joystick+ 4 big buttons + 2 small buttons + joystick select button ) gives your Arduino functionality on the level of old Nintendo controllers.

title: Arduino Prototype Screw Shield
description: The ScrewShield extends all pins of the Arduino out to 3.5mm pitch screw terminals. It extends the Arduino pins to sturdy, secure, and dependable screw terminal blocks.
